Local Directions for AWS 2014

Locations

DoubleTree Tucson: 445 South Alvernon Way, Tucson AZ 85711. Tel: (520) 881-4200.
The Double Tree is located on the east side of Alvernon Way, across from Reid Park, less than half a mile south of Broadway Blvd.

McClelland Hall: 1130 E. Helen St., Tucson AZ 85721.
McClelland is located on the north side of Speedway Blvd., over half a mile west of Campbell Ave.; the entrance is one block to the north of Speedway, on Helen.

Driving to the lectures

Here are driving directions from Google Maps:

  • Driving from the DoubleTree to McClelland

Participants with cars may park in the Park Avenue Garage immediately to the west of McClelland Hall, at the corner of Park and Speedway. The garage should be free on the weekend and cost $8 per day on the weekdays. You may also be able to find street parking in the neighborhood to the north of McClelland.

Shuttle Service

Since the hotel is not within walking distance of the lectures, the hotel is providing a shuttle/bus service between the hotel and the lecture hall. In the morning, the schedule is as follows:

  • The first bus will leave the hotel at 8 am, and other buses will leave when full after that. In order to be on time, we strongly recommend that you be at the lobby by 8:30 am.

After the lectures, the shuttle schedule is as follows:

  • For those wishing to return to the hotel, buses will be available in front of McClelland Hall directly after the lectures, except on Monday when they will pick up at 1:30 PM for those not going on the Desert Museum excursion.
  • For those wishing to have stay longer or have dinner in the university area, there will be shuttle pickups at the University Marriott lobby driveway at 5:30 on M-W and 6:50 on Sa-Tu. (The Marriott is just north of University Ave., behind Gentle Ben's.)
  • To be picked up at any other time, you can call the main hotel switchboard at 520-881-4200. However, the scheduled pickups are the only times and places for which we can guarantee the prompt availability of a shuttle.

Lunch

The most convenient location for lunch is the area around University Blvd. and Park Ave., about 1/2 mile SSW of McClelland Hall. There is a pedestrian underpass underneath Speedway on the west side of McClelland. The easiest way to get to University and Park is to head south under it and through campus, eventually veering right to Park Ave., which you can continue to follow south to University Ave. See the map below. (One can also walk towards Speedway and Campbell to the east.)

Map

The pins on this map show the DoubleTree, McClelland, the Park Street garage, the corner of University and Park, and the after-dinner shuttle pickup point.
